scoringPlays.text: J.K. Dobbins 6 Yd Run (Sean Nuernberger Kick)
Dimitri Flowers 36 Yd pass from Baker Mayfield (Austin Seibert Kick)
Lee Morris 18 Yd pass from Baker Mayfield (Austin Seibert Kick)
Trey Sermon 10 Yd pass from Baker Mayfield (Austin Seibert Kick)
Jordan Smallwood 3 Yd Run (Austin Seibert Kick)

videos.description: Ohio State LB Chris Worley knocks the ball loose from Abdul Adams to force the fumble and give the ball back to the Buckeyes.
videos.headline: Ohio State forces 1st turnover of game

videos.description: Initially ruled an incomplete pass, the pass from Baker Mayfield to Jeff Badet is ruled a fumble after review for Oklahoma's second turnover of the game.
videos.headline: Buckeyes recover backwards pass fumble

videos.description: Ohio State head coach Urban Meyer was upset with his offense's first half performance, which totaled under 100 yards.
videos.headline: Meyer says his offense's 1st half performance was terrible

videos.description: Not much offense as the Buckeyes and the Sooners are knotted at 3-3 at the half.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (OSU-Oklahoma locked in physical affair at half) 2017/9/9 ESHEET ENHL

videos.headline: OSU-Oklahoma locked in physical affair at half

videos.description: Parris Campbell returns the 2nd half opening kickoff 56-yards to set up Ohio State with good field position.
videos.headline: Ohio State starts 2nd half in Oklahoma territory

videos.description: J.K. Dobbins takes the handoff and rushes in the 6-yard touchdown for the Buckeyes.
videos.headline: Dobbins runs OSU's first TD

videos.description: Baker Mayfield passes to Dimitri Flowers off the play-action for the first Oklahoma touchdown of the game.
videos.headline: Mayfield finds Flowers for TD to even the game

videos.description: After review it is determined that Austin Mack completed the incredible leaping catch on the pass from J.T. Barrett.
videos.headline: Mack makes spectacular leaping catch

videos.description: Baker Mayfield completes the 42-yard pass downfield to Mykel Jones to set up Oklahoma in the red zone.
videos.headline: Mayfield connects with Jones downfield for big gain

videos.description: Baker Mayfield off the play-action passes to Lee Morris for the 18-yard Oklahoma touchdown.
videos.headline: Mayfield finds Morris for the Sooner TD

videos.description: Baker Mayfield finds Trey Sermon who fights off defenders to make his way into the end zone.
videos.headline: Sermon fights his way into the end zone for the Oklahoma TD

videos.description: Parnell Motley intercepts the pass from J.T. Barrett to set up Oklahoma with good field position.
videos.headline: Motley steps in front of Barrett pass for the INT

videos.description: Jordan Smallwood takes the handoff on the jet sweep and powers his way into the end zone for the touchdown.
videos.headline: Oklahoma uses jet sweep to go up 31-13

videos.description: Oklahoma head coach Lincoln Riley and QB Baker Mayfield discuss how they were able to turn around their offense in the 2nd half.
videos.headline: Riley and Mayfield talk about 2nd half turnaround

videos.description: Tied at 3-3 at the half, Baker Mayfield throws for 386 yards and three touchdowns as Oklahoma cruises past Ohio State 31-16.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Sooners power past Buckeyes) 2017/9/9 ESHEET ENHL

videos.headline: Sooners power past Buckeyes

videos.description: Baker Mayfield throws for 386 yards and three touchdowns as No. 5 Oklahoma beats No. 2 Ohio State 31-16 on the road.
videos.headline: Mayfield leads Oklahoma past Ohio State
